page.title: 06Pebworth First School
page.content: The school,opened in l904, has 45 pupils aged 5 - l0 on roll with a headmaster & l.5 teachers. There are 2 classrooms & a large hall. The school day (9.l5 - 3.l5) starts with the ringing of the old bell. Subjects taught include Maths, English. Music, Science, Project work & P.E. indoors or on the playground or field. A computer, gym aparatus and calor gas central heating have recently been installed. Pupils bring sandwiches or go home for lunch. Weekly swimming lessons take place in Evesham and the school participates in sporting activities with other first schools. After school activities include gym, guitar and recorder tuition. At l0 yrs.pupils transfer to Blackminster Middle School and then at l3 yrs to Evesham High School.Transport is provided.
